name: Homegear::deleteFamilySetting
shortDescription: Deletes a family setting from the database
description: This method deletes a family setting from the database. The files for the family settings are not modified. If the setting does not exist, nothing happens.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: The family ID for which you want to delete the setting

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the setting you want to delete; use only lower-case characters here.
